short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate dApp interactions and record transactions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zodiac Pilot connects your Safe to all of web3 with the simplicity of MetaMask. Transactions are first simulated in a blockchain fork, allowing you to batch and validate entire transaction flows before collecting signatures for execution.

Built-in support for nested account structures, roles and zodiac modules make Pilot the execution interface of choice for advanced Safe users.
